trans-unit.source: Create a global web presence on Azure App Service Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Create a global web presence on Azure App Service Web Apps

trans-unit.source: This guide provides a technical overview of how to host your organization's (.COM) site on Azure App Service Web Apps. This includes deployment, custom domains, SSL, and monitoring.
trans-unit.target: This guide provides a technical overview of how to host your organization's (.COM) site on Azure App Service Web Apps. This includes deployment, custom domains, SSL, and monitoring.

trans-unit.source: Create a global web presence on Azure App Service Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Create a global web presence on Azure App Service Web Apps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure App Service</linkText><title></title></link> Web Apps has all the capabilities you need to establish a global web presence for your .COM site.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure App Service</linkText><title></title></link> Web Apps has all the capabilities you need to establish a global web presence for your .COM site.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the size of your organization, you need a robust, secure, and scalable platform to drive your business , your brand awareness, and your customer communications.
trans-unit.target: Regardless of the size of your organization, you need a robust, secure, and scalable platform to drive your business , your brand awareness, and your customer communications.

trans-unit.source: App Service Web Apps can help maintain your corporate brand and identity with Microsoft backed business continuity.
trans-unit.target: App Service Web Apps can help maintain your corporate brand and identity with Microsoft backed business continuity.

trans-unit.source: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to <link><linkText>Try App Service</linkText><title></title></link>, where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.
trans-unit.target: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before signing up for an Azure account, go to <link><linkText>Try App Service</linkText><title></title></link>, where you can immediately create a short-lived starter web app in App Service.

trans-unit.source: No credit cards required; no commitments.
trans-unit.target: No credit cards required; no commitments.

trans-unit.source: Below is an example of a .COM website running on App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: Below is an example of a .COM website running on App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates what you can do simply by composing Web Apps together with other services with minimal technical investments.
trans-unit.target: It demonstrates what you can do simply by composing Web Apps together with other services with minimal technical investments.

trans-unit.source: Click on an element in the topography to read more about it.
trans-unit.target: Click on an element in the topography to read more about it.

trans-unit.source: This guide presents some of the most common areas and tasks that are aligned with running a public-facing .COM site in Azure App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: This guide presents some of the most common areas and tasks that are aligned with running a public-facing .COM site in Azure App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: However, there are other common solutions that you can implement in Azure App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: However, there are other common solutions that you can implement in Azure App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: To review these solutions, see the other guides on <link><linkText>Digital Marketing Campaigns</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Business Applications</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To review these solutions, see the other guides on <link><linkText>Digital Marketing Campaigns</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>Business Applications</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Create from scratch or bring existing assets
trans-unit.target: Create from scratch or bring existing assets

trans-unit.source: Quickly create new sites from a popular CMS in the gallery or bring your existing web assets to App Service Web Apps from a variety of languages and frameworks.
trans-unit.target: Quickly create new sites from a popular CMS in the gallery or bring your existing web assets to App Service Web Apps from a variety of languages and frameworks.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Marketplace provides templates from the popular website content management systems (CMS), such as [Orchard], [Umbraco], Drupal, and [WordPress].
trans-unit.target: The Azure Marketplace provides templates from the popular website content management systems (CMS), such as [Orchard], [Umbraco], Drupal, and [WordPress].

trans-unit.source: You can create a web app using your favorite CMS flavor.
trans-unit.target: You can create a web app using your favorite CMS flavor.

trans-unit.source: You can choose from various database backends to meet your needs, including [Azure SQL Database] and [MySQL].
trans-unit.target: You can choose from various database backends to meet your needs, including [Azure SQL Database] and [MySQL].

trans-unit.source: Your existing web assets can run on App Service Web Apps, whether they are .NET, PHP, Java, Node.js, or Python.
trans-unit.target: Your existing web assets can run on App Service Web Apps, whether they are .NET, PHP, Java, Node.js, or Python.

trans-unit.source: You can move them to Web Apps using your familiar [FTP] tools or your source control management system.
trans-unit.target: You can move them to Web Apps using your familiar [FTP] tools or your source control management system.

trans-unit.source: Web Apps supports direct publishing from popular source control options, such as [Visual Studio], [Visual Studio Online], and [Git] - local, GitHub, BitBucket, DropBox, Mercurial, etc..
trans-unit.target: Web Apps supports direct publishing from popular source control options, such as [Visual Studio], [Visual Studio Online], and [Git] - local, GitHub, BitBucket, DropBox, Mercurial, etc..

trans-unit.source: Publish reliably
trans-unit.target: Publish reliably

trans-unit.source: Publish your website reliably by continuously publishing directly from your existing source control system and live-testing your content.
trans-unit.target: Publish your website reliably by continuously publishing directly from your existing source control system and live-testing your content.

trans-unit.source: During the planning, prototyping, and early development of a site, you can look at real working versions of the website before it goes live by [deploying to a staging slot] of your site on App Service Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: During the planning, prototyping, and early development of a site, you can look at real working versions of the website before it goes live by [deploying to a staging slot] of your site on App Service Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: By integrating source control with Web Apps, you can [continuously publish] to a staging slot, and swap it into production with no downtime when you are ready to do so.
trans-unit.target: By integrating source control with Web Apps, you can [continuously publish] to a staging slot, and swap it into production with no downtime when you are ready to do so.

trans-unit.source: If anything goes wrong on the production site, you can also swap it out for a previous version of your site immediately.
trans-unit.target: If anything goes wrong on the production site, you can also swap it out for a previous version of your site immediately.

trans-unit.source: Also, when planning changes to a live website, you can easily [run A/B tests] on the proposed updates using the Test in Production feature in and analyze real user behavior to help you make informed decisions on site design.
trans-unit.target: Also, when planning changes to a live website, you can easily [run A/B tests] on the proposed updates using the Test in Production feature in and analyze real user behavior to help you make informed decisions on site design.

trans-unit.source: Brand and secure
trans-unit.target: Brand and secure

trans-unit.source: Use the App Service Web Apps domain for free or map to your registered domain name, then secure your brand with your CA-signed SSL certificate.
trans-unit.target: Use the App Service Web Apps domain for free or map to your registered domain name, then secure your brand with your CA-signed SSL certificate.

trans-unit.source: The \*.azurewebsites.net domain is complimentary when you run your website on Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: The \*.azurewebsites.net domain is complimentary when you run your website on Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: Or, you can map your website to a [custom domain] - e.g. contoso.com - which you obtained from any DNS registry, such as GoDaddy.
trans-unit.target: Or, you can map your website to a [custom domain] - e.g. contoso.com - which you obtained from any DNS registry, such as GoDaddy.

trans-unit.source: If you collect any user information, perform ecommerce, or manage any other sensitive data, you can protect your brand reputation and your customers with [HTTPS].
trans-unit.target: If you collect any user information, perform ecommerce, or manage any other sensitive data, you can protect your brand reputation and your customers with [HTTPS].

trans-unit.source: The \*.azurewebsites.net domain name already comes with an SSL certificate, and if you use your custom domain, you can bring your SSL certificate for it to Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: The \*.azurewebsites.net domain name already comes with an SSL certificate, and if you use your custom domain, you can bring your SSL certificate for it to Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: There is a monthly charge (prorated hourly) associated with each SSL certificate.
trans-unit.target: There is a monthly charge (prorated hourly) associated with each SSL certificate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [App Service Pricing Details].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [App Service Pricing Details].

trans-unit.source: Go global
trans-unit.target: Go global

trans-unit.source: Go global by serving regional sites with Azure Traffic Manager and delivering content lightning fast with Azure CDN.
trans-unit.target: Go global by serving regional sites with Azure Traffic Manager and delivering content lightning fast with Azure CDN.

trans-unit.source: To serve global customers in their respective regions, use [Azure Traffic Manager] to route site visitors to a regional site that provides the best performance.
trans-unit.target: To serve global customers in their respective regions, use [Azure Traffic Manager] to route site visitors to a regional site that provides the best performance.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can spread the site load evenly across multiple copies of your website hosted in multiple regions.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can spread the site load evenly across multiple copies of your website hosted in multiple regions.

trans-unit.source: Deliver your static content lightning fast to users globally by [integrating your web app with Azure CDN].
trans-unit.target: Deliver your static content lightning fast to users globally by [integrating your web app with Azure CDN].

trans-unit.source: Azure CDN caches static content in the [CDN node] closest to the user, which minimizes latency and connections to your website.
trans-unit.target: Azure CDN caches static content in the [CDN node] closest to the user, which minimizes latency and connections to your website.

trans-unit.source: Optimize
trans-unit.target: Optimize

trans-unit.source: Optimize your .COM site by scaling automatically with Autoscale, caching with Azure Redis Cache, running background tasks with WebJobs, and maintaining high availability with Azure Traffic Manager.
trans-unit.target: Optimize your .COM site by scaling automatically with Autoscale, caching with Azure Redis Cache, running background tasks with WebJobs, and maintaining high availability with Azure Traffic Manager.

trans-unit.source: The ability of App Service Web Apps to [scale up and out] meets the need of your .COM site, regardless of the size of your workload.
trans-unit.target: The ability of App Service Web Apps to [scale up and out] meets the need of your .COM site, regardless of the size of your workload.

trans-unit.source: Scale out your website manually through the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>, programmatically through the [Service Management API] or [PowerShell scripting], or automatically through the Autoscale feature.
trans-unit.target: Scale out your website manually through the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>, programmatically through the [Service Management API] or [PowerShell scripting], or automatically through the Autoscale feature.

trans-unit.source: In Standard hosting plan, Autoscale enables you to scale out a website automatically based on CPU utilization.
trans-unit.target: In Standard hosting plan, Autoscale enables you to scale out a website automatically based on CPU utilization.

trans-unit.source: For best practices, see [Troy Hunt]'s [10 things I learned about rapidly scaling web apps with Azure].
trans-unit.target: For best practices, see [Troy Hunt]'s [10 things I learned about rapidly scaling web apps with Azure].

trans-unit.source: Make your website more responsive with the [Azure Redis Cache].
trans-unit.target: Make your website more responsive with the [Azure Redis Cache].

trans-unit.source: Use it to cache data from backend databases and other things such as the [ASP.NET session state] and [output cache].
trans-unit.target: Use it to cache data from backend databases and other things such as the [ASP.NET session state] and [output cache].

trans-unit.source: Maintain high availability of your website using [Azure Traffic Manager].
trans-unit.target: Maintain high availability of your website using [Azure Traffic Manager].

trans-unit.source: Using the Failover method, Traffic Manager automatically routes traffic to a secondary site if there is a problem on the primary site.
trans-unit.target: Using the Failover method, Traffic Manager automatically routes traffic to a secondary site if there is a problem on the primary site.

trans-unit.source: Monitor and analyze
trans-unit.target: Monitor and analyze

trans-unit.source: Stay up-to-date on your website's performance with Azure or third-party tools.
trans-unit.target: Stay up-to-date on your website's performance with Azure or third-party tools.

trans-unit.source: Receive alerts on critical website events.
trans-unit.target: Receive alerts on critical website events.

trans-unit.source: Gain user insight easily with Application Insight or with web log analytics from HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Gain user insight easily with Application Insight or with web log analytics from HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Get a [quick glance] of the website's current performance metrics and resource quotas in the web app's blade in the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>. For a 360° view of your application across availability, performance and usage, use [Azure Application Insights] to give you fast & powerful troubleshooting, diagnostics and usage insights. Or, use a third-party tool like [New Relic] to provide advanced monitoring data for your websites.
trans-unit.target: Get a [quick glance] of the website's current performance metrics and resource quotas in the web app's blade in the <link><linkText>Azure preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>. For a 360° view of your application across availability, performance and usage, use [Azure Application Insights] to give you fast & powerful troubleshooting, diagnostics and usage insights. Or, use a third-party tool like [New Relic] to provide advanced monitoring data for your websites.

trans-unit.source: In the Standard hosting plan, monitor site responsiveness receive email notifications whenever your site becomes unresponsive.
trans-unit.target: In the Standard hosting plan, monitor site responsiveness receive email notifications whenever your site becomes unresponsive.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [How to: Receive Alert Notifications and Manage Alert Rules in Azure].

trans-unit.source: Use rich media and reach all devices
trans-unit.target: Use rich media and reach all devices

trans-unit.source: Make your .COM site attractive with rich media, such as:
trans-unit.target: Make your .COM site attractive with rich media, such as:

trans-unit.source: Upload and stream videos globally with [Azure Media Services]
trans-unit.target: Upload and stream videos globally with [Azure Media Services]

trans-unit.source: Send emails to users with [SendGrid service in Azure Marketplace]
trans-unit.target: Send emails to users with [SendGrid service in Azure Marketplace]
